localize.text: It's the real name of the song she plays.
It is said that the nickname "Wolfgang" was created after listening to the first movement of the song, describing it as "like a sculpture on a lake with moonlight."
I'm not sure if this nickname expresses this song well.
Tales say that the moon bewitches man, yet in reality, it is the man that despairs at the moon.
[Final Observation of El Llanto de la Luna achieved.]
